attributes.action: I have made you as God.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I have made you as God. Exodus 7: 1
The Right Honorable Prime Minster Tony Blair is God of the 21st Century anointed and appointed by Jesus Christ to enhance or help world trade, global poverty through to the fight against terrorism, whether in Afghanistan or Iraq or elsewhere – as it can't be done without the United States of America Prime Minster Tony Blair deserves help and support of his party, the government and people of the United Kingdom to work together in relationship with the United States of America as it is a strength in places like this because people know that, whether it is Israel/Palestine or sorting out the economic problems of the region or any of the major challenges that we face today.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
